title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 464.1 - Volunteer services program
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 464.1 - Volunteer services program

State Regulations

All social services districts shall have functioning
volunteer programs. Group I and group II districts (as defined in section
679.2
) may consider the
feasibility of sharing volunteer services programs with contiguous group I or
group II districts. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
464.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
